description:
Konoe Touta is the "grandson" of http://anidb.net/ch4675 [Negi] and two years prior, Touta was a former human transformed into a vampire. It is later revealed that he is the clone of Negi and http://anidb.net/ch4680 [Asuna], for the sole purpose of inheriting their powers. Out of 72 experimental subjects, Touta was the only success.
Source: UQ Holder Wiki
name: Konoe Touta
